text: haey krob anakneasar ning na pi del yeung minban banhchoun mk moun anak shai t n tengte chachaw knong kar sautr robsa ke nowpel delke sautr( ayeat robsa yeung) . te a l laoh loubbambat nouv avei del shai t n ban chachaw noh . banteabmk a l laoh pongrung ayeat robsa trong vinh . haey a l laoh mha doeng mha ktebandet
